attributes.action: Deliver Brexit by 31 October 19 deal or no deal and restore faith in democracy.
attributes.additional_details:
Cooper-Letwin bill.
Upcoming Cooper-Letwin 2.0
Church House Declaration.
attributes.background: MPs actions to frustrate and even stop Brexit (aided by a bias speaker of house) using ‘avoiding no-deal’ as their justification, will never be satisfied with anything less than ‘No Brexit’. Their refusal to do their duty and deliver the result of the referendum is truly undemocratic.
